verses.verse: And Bezaleel <WH1212> made <WH6213> the ark <WH727> of shittim <WH7848> wood: <WH6086> two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> was the length <WH753> of it, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the breadth <WH7341> of it, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the height <WH6967> of it:
And he overlaid <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> within <WH1004> and without, <WH2351> and made <WH6213> a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> to it round <WH5439> about.

And he cast <WH3332> for it four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold, <WH2091> to be set by the four <WH702> corners <WH6471> of it; even two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on the one <WH259> side <WH6763> of it, and two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on the other <WH8145> side <WH6763> of it.
And he made <WH6213> staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlaid <WH6823> them with gold. <WH2091>
And he put <WH935> the staves <WH905> into the rings <WH2885> by the sides <WH6763> of the ark, <WH727> to bear <WH5375> the ark. <WH727>

And he made <WH6213> the mercy <WH3727> seat of pure <WH2889> gold: <WH2091> two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> was the length <WH753> thereof, and one cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the breadth <WH7341> thereof.
And he made <WH6213> two <WH8147> cherubim <WH3742> of gold, <WH2091> beaten <WH4749> out of one piece <WH4749> made <WH6213> he them, on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the mercy <WH3727> seat;

One <WH259> cherub <WH3742> on the end <WH7098> on this <WH2088> side, and another <WH259> cherub <WH3742> on the other end <WH7098> on that side: out of the mercy <WH3727> seat made <WH6213> he the cherubim <WH3742> on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7099> thereof.

And the cherubim <WH3742> spread <WH6566> out their wings <WH3671> on high, <WH4605> and covered <WH5526> with their wings <WH3671> over <WH5980> the mercy <WH3727> seat, with their faces <WH6440> one <WH376> to another; <WH251> even to the mercy <WH3727> seat were the faces <WH6440> of the cherubim. <WH3742>

And he made <WH6213> the table <WH7979> of shittim <WH7848> wood: <WH6086> two cubits <WH520> was the length <WH753> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the height <WH6967> thereof:
And he overlaid <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> and made <WH6213> thereunto a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round <WH5439> about.

Also he made <WH6213> thereunto a border <WH4526> of an handbreadth <WH2948> round <WH5439> about; and made <WH6213> a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> for the border <WH4526> thereof round <WH5439> about.
And he cast <WH3332> for it four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold, <WH2091> and put <WH5414> the rings <WH2885> on the four <WH702> corners <WH6285> that were in the four <WH702> feet <WH7272> thereof.
Over <WH5980> against <WH5980> the border <WH4526> were the rings, <WH2885> the places <WH1004> for the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> the table. <WH7979>
And he made <WH6213> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlaid <WH6823> them with gold, <WH2091> to bear <WH5375> the table. <WH7979>

And he made <WH6213> the vessels <WH3627> which <WH834> were on the table, <WH7979> his dishes, <WH7086> and his spoons, <WH3709> and his bowls, <WH4518> and his covers <WH7184> to cover <WH5258> with, <WH2004> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>

And he made <WH6213> the candlestick <WH4501> of pure <WH2889> gold: <WH2091> of beaten <WH4749> work <WH4749> made <WH6213> he the candlestick; <WH4501> his shaft, <WH3409> and his branch, <WH7070> his bowls, <WH1375> his knops, <WH3730> and his flowers, <WH6525> were of the same:

And six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going <WH3318> out of the sides <WH6654> thereof; three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the one side <WH6654> thereof, and three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the other <WH8145> side <WH6654> thereof:

Three <WH7969> bowls <WH1375> made after the fashion of almonds <WH8246> in one <WH259> branch, <WH7070> a bud <WH3730> and a flower; <WH6525> and three <WH7969> bowls <WH1375> made like almonds <WH8246> in another <WH259> branch, <WH7070> a bud <WH3730> and a flower: <WH6525> so <WH3651> throughout the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going <WH3318> out of the candlestick. <WH4501>
And in the candlestick <WH4501> were four <WH702> bowls <WH1375> made like almonds, <WH8246> his knops, <WH3730> and his flowers: <WH6525>

And a bud <WH3730> under <WH8478> two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, and a bud <WH3730> under <WH8478> two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, and a bud <WH3730> under <WH8478> two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, according to the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going <WH3318> out of it.
Their knops <WH3730> and their branches <WH7070> were of the same: all <WH3605> of it was one <WH259> beaten <WH4749> work <WH4749> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>
And he made <WH6213> his seven <WH7651> lamps, <WH5216> and his snuffers, <WH4457> and his firepans, <WH4289> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>
Of a talent <WH3603> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> made <WH6213> he it, and all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> thereof.

And he made <WH6213> the incense <WH7004> altar <WH4196> of shittim <WH7848> wood: <WH6086> the length <WH753> of it was a cubit, <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> of it a cubit; <WH520> it was foursquare; <WH7251> and two cubits <WH520> was the height <WH6967> of it; the horns <WH7161> thereof were of the same.

And he overlaid <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> both the top <WH1406> of it, and the sides <WH7023> thereof round <WH5439> about, and the horns <WH7161> of it: also he made <WH6213> to it a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round <WH5439> about.

And he made <WH6213> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> for it under <WH8478> the crown <WH2213> thereof, by the two <WH8147> corners <WH6763> of it, on the two <WH8147> sides <WH6654> thereof, to be places <WH1004> for the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> it with.
And he made <WH6213> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlaid <WH6823> them with gold. <WH2091>
And he made <WH6213> the holy <WH6944> anointing <WH4888> oil, and the pure <WH2889> incense <WH7004> of sweet <WH5561> spices, <WH5561> according to the work <WH4639> of the apothecary. <WH7543>
